text.text: When attempting too collect fossils, you'll need some different tools. For the fossils we want, we'll need a hammer. They can be aquired from a Black Market. Then, to collect the fossil and safely transport it, we'll need some wet paper.

Carefully, break the soft stone without fossil. You'll tell they are if they don't have a dark patch. You'll want to seperate the peaces with fossils to avoid the potental of them breaking others if they fall. Also, don't stand on them either.
